languages.text: "К чему им заклинания? Мои братья и без них найдут свой путь, сестра. Деяния их весомее наших слов".
"Why do they need spells? My brothers will find their way without them, Sister. Their deeds are greater than any words we can utter."
languages.original_text: "К чему им заклинания? Мои братья и без них найдут свой путь, сестра. Деяния их весомее наших слов".

traits.locale_text: "Why do they need spells? My brothers will find their way without them, Sister. Their deeds are greater than any words we can utter."
"Why do they need spells? My brothers will find their way without them, Sister. Their deeds are greater than any words we can utter."
"Why do they need spells? My brothers will find their way without them, Sister. Their deeds are greater than any words we can utter."
"Why do they need spells? My brothers will find their way without them, Sister. Their deeds are greater than any words we can utter."

languages.text: “他们哪里需要什么咒语？就算没有这些咒语，我的兄弟们也能找到道路，修女。他们的功绩比任何言语都要更加伟大。”
languages.original_text: "Why do they need spells? My brothers will find their way without them, Sister. Their deeds are greater than any words we can utter."

traits.locale_text: “他们哪里需要什么咒语？就算没有这些咒语，我的兄弟们也能找到道路，修女。他们的功绩比任何言语都要更加伟大。”

languages.text: « Pourquoi auraient-ils besoin d'un quelconque sortilège ? Mes frères s'en sortiront très bien sans, ma sœur. Aucune prière ne pourrait décrire les exploits qu'ils ont accomplis à leur juste valeur. »
languages.original_text: "Why do they need spells? My brothers will find their way without them, Sister. Their deeds are greater than any words we can utter."

traits.locale_text: « Pourquoi auraient-ils besoin d'un quelconque sortilège ? Mes frères s'en sortiront très bien sans, ma sœur. Aucune prière ne pourrait décrire les exploits qu'ils ont accomplis à leur juste valeur. »

languages.text: «¿Qué necesidad tienen de hechizos? Mis hermanos encontrarán solos el camino, hermana. Sus gestas son mayores que cualquier palabra que podamos pronunciar».
languages.original_text: "Why do they need spells? My brothers will find their way without them, Sister. Their deeds are greater than any words we can utter."

traits.locale_text: «¿Qué necesidad tienen de hechizos? Mis hermanos encontrarán solos el camino, hermana. Sus gestas son mayores que cualquier palabra que podamos pronunciar».

languages.text: 「なぜ呪文が必要なんだ？俺の兄弟は呪文が無くても道を見つけるさ、 シスター。奴らの行いは 俺たちが口にできるどんな言葉よりも偉大なんだ」
languages.original_text: "Why do they need spells? My brothers will find their way without them, Sister. Their deeds are greater than any words we can utter."

traits.locale_text: 「なぜ呪文が必要なんだ？俺の兄弟は呪文が無くても道を見つけるさ、 シスター。奴らの行いは 俺たちが口にできるどんな言葉よりも偉大なんだ」

languages.text: "Warum brauchen sie Zauber? Meine Brüder finden ihren Weg auch ohne, Schwester. Ihre Taten sind größer als alle Worte, die wir sprechen könnten."
languages.original_text: "Why do they need spells? My brothers will find their way without them, Sister. Their deeds are greater than any words we can utter."

traits.locale_text: "Warum brauchen sie Zauber? Meine Brüder finden ihren Weg auch ohne, Schwester. Ihre Taten sind größer als alle Worte, die wir sprechen könnten."

languages.original_text: "Why do they need spells? My brothers will find their way without them, Sister. Their deeds are greater than any words we can utter."

languages.text: "Neden duaya ihtiyaçları olsun? Kardeşlerim dua olmasa da yolunu bulur Rahibe. Eylemleri, zikredeceğimiz sözlerden büyüktür."
languages.original_text: "Why do they need spells? My brothers will find their way without them, Sister. Their deeds are greater than any words we can utter."

traits.locale_text: "Neden duaya ihtiyaçları olsun? Kardeşlerim dua olmasa da yolunu bulur Rahibe. Eylemleri, bizim söyleyebileceğimiz sözlerden büyüktür."
